Articles.Content:
**KSP:** 0.90 Windows 32 Bit

**Problem:** Can't click several buildings, only VAB and Science Facility, but can't leave them because of UI-Glitches

**Mods installed:**

Many, please refer to following ckan screenshot:

[http://i.imgur.com/5I1m6oz.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/5I1m6oz.jpg)

**Reproduction Steps:** 

Migrating KSP to ckan. Set up a KSP-version with ckan, using almost the same mod-list, which I use with my manually created and working KSP install. After copying the saves from my old to my new ckan-managed ksp-install, starting the game, and loading the save, the bug occurs every time.

I can't enter any bulding but the VAB and the Science Facility. If I click the exit-button in one of these building, the glitches show up and I can't do anything but closing the game. See [http://i.imgur.com/LKh7fZo.png](http://i.imgur.com/LKh7fZo.png) for the glitches (right top corner)

**Log:**

[https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B_GyaquZSK3vUnpJblRES0NabFU/view?usp=sharing](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B_GyaquZSK3vUnpJblRES0NabFU/view?usp=sharing)

Make sure you in fact have RSS v8.6.0 or v8.6.1 (right-click the dll in GameData/RealSolarSystem/Plugins and go to the details tab). Make sure there are no other RealSolarSystem.dll files anywhere else.

Hi, just one RealSolarSystem.dll in the whole Gamedata-directory, version 0.8.6.0.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-15T17:31:14Z" title="04/15/2015 05:31  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 15, 2015</time> by Friedrich Nietzsche**
Update: It seems to be savegame related. When I start a new Career, everything works fine.
And then you load the save and it breaks?
If I load the career from the other installation, which I intended to continue, the game shows the described behaviour.
This sounds 100% like the bug RSS was having before, like, 8.5. What launch site do you switch to once you start a new game?

> 
> This sounds 100% like the bug RSS was having before, like, 8.5. What launch site do you switch to once you start a new game?

My favorite launch site is french guiana. But the game usually starts at cape canaveral after loading a save, albeit it's marked marked different in the tracking station.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-16T18:26:39Z" title="04/16/2015 06:26  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 16, 2015</time> by Friedrich Nietzsche**
If you load your save and go into tracking station, click on another site, then click on the desired site, does that help?

> 
> If you load your save and go into tracking station, click on another site, then click on the desired site, does that help?

I've done that always to switch back to french guiana after loading a game. But at the moment I even can't enter the tracking station. It highlights, when I hover the cursor over it, but clicking on it has no effect.

Maybe I'll just start a new career ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-17T16:52:14Z" title="04/17/2015 04:52  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 17, 2015</time> by Friedrich Nietzsche**
That is really, really confusing alas; it seems like you're the only person getting that bug in current RSS. :\
This a problem with some persistent saves. I'm afraid your save file is for some reason corrupted. Sorry. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

A risk, that comes, when playing alpha and beta versions

I've started a new carreer today. The beginning is much more fun now with the current version of rp-0.

But still thanks for your efforts ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
